author: dkhaywood
msg: changing calls to SpecificationLoader#loadSpecification(Class) to instead call SpecificationLoader#loadSpecification(String) - want to put a class loader in specloader, which means can only deal with strings before hand.   Build should still be green, exploration dnd runs

author: dkhaywood
msg: fixed problem with PerspectiveLocator when running as exploration (not sure why didn't show up earlier); also refactored NakedObjects bootstrapping to separate out cmdline processing and also introduced a NakedObjectSystemFactory as a strategy for creating NakedObjectSystem by the bootstrapper.  (All this as prereq to some experiments I want to do with javassist)
